name: inferiority
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 the state of not being good, or not as good as someone or something else: sense of inferiority His ill treatment as a child had given him a strong sense of inferiority. Women had a position of social inferiority as compared with men. Compare
superiority (BETTER)See
inferior
More examplesFewer examplesAttitudes of racial inferiority have continued to plague western culture.They want to eliminate practices which are based on the idea of the inferiority or the superiority of either of the sexes.He made comments concerning the intellectual inferiority of women during seminars.
